channel.title: "Client updated! Please reload the page" Error
channel.description:
Hi, I am trying to "code" (mostly edit for now) my first rsps ever. It is 317 based. I used to be able to connect to the server fine, but now I keep getting this error that the game has been updated, and to reload the page. Obviously I have tried closing/recompiling/opening the client again, but I am still getting this error. It basically came out of nowhere; I don't know how I could have caused this.
Can anyone PLEASE help me out here? I've spent hours trying to get this fixed already. My server is online and I am just hosting it locally.
